website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you prefer small sunglasses and don't mind the higher price tag. The aviator design is timeless, and the features are ideal for fun in the sun.
pros: Small yet durable titanium frames - ideal for women with smaller faces
Polarized lenses are ideal for active wear
cons: The downside of the small build is that they fit larger faces too tightly

customer_reviews.title: These fit my face beautifully. And the quality is great
customer_reviews.text: I seriously can't believe I purchased these, as expensive as they are, without trying them on first. I really lucked out. I have a petite face and always look ridiculous in adult sunglasses. These fit my face beautifully. And the quality is great. I've been practically living in them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Yonckheere

customer_reviews.title: These are FAKES....NO Box or Authentic Case...
customer_reviews.text: These are fakes. They didn't come with the box. They came in a cheap black case which is NOT one of the TWO cases Maui Jim offers. They also came with a fake small cleaning cloth that was in cheap plastic wrap. REAL Maui Jim's come with a sport case or a hard tan case. They come with a quality cleaning cloth AND a draw string soft pouch case. I'll be returning them and ordering straight from Maui Jim.
customer_reviews.author: JTobs

customer_reviews.title: so we know what true maui jims look like. This is like a 3 dollar pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: FAKE !!! DO NOT BUY. They are knockoffs. Just opened the package and they are not even the same shape. The name is not the same on the lenses. This would have been our 4th pair of Maui jims, and second pair of baby beach sunglasses, so we know what true maui jims look like. This is like a 3 dollar pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Temptation

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. They fit perfectly and are very well made. I own the Wiki Wiki's from Maui Jim and my wife wanted a pair similar to mine, but smaller so they would fit her face better. They did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Rane H.

customer_reviews.title: Oddly  not all that dark in the bright sun!!
customer_reviews.text: I was driving home, heading in to the sun. And i was squinting so bad. That i started looking for my old pair of Maui jims, in the counsel. To see if they would help. And to my complete surprise. The new Maui jims were considerably lighter. When held up to the sun. Side by side. Too light in my judgement. Since maui jims are known for being the best in the bright sun. These were supposed to be the dark gray lenses. Not so much when compared to my old pair. Just odd???? I have been wearing maui jims for so long. Because they are the best. These are my first pair of maui jims that I ever returned.
customer_reviews.author: J. STERLING

customer_reviews.title: Good option for smaller faces.
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller face, so a lot of popular styles don't fit me very well. I've also become accustomed to Maui Jim polarized lenses, and other brands really don't compare. This time around I tried Randolph Engineering and Ray Ban again before coming back to the realization I needed to find Maui Jims I liked. These fit my face well, and get me my lenses. Wish Maui made a more standard aviator in this size, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses hold up wonderfully! They have been dropped and squished by my ...
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses hold up wonderfully! They have been dropped and squished by my small children and fit just as well as they did the day that I got them. You can get an aviator look without having the glasses take up your whole face. They are great with filtering out the sunlight and are very fashionable. I definitely recommend these to anyone who needs a durable, yet stylish, pair of glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This product was fake. Very disappointing. I have had Maui Jims and these look nothing like it. Look like a cheap pair of dollar store sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan

customer_reviews.title: great design! so so lens
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of Maui Jim baby beach ... looks classy and I love it I'd love it if this had a better lens. Clarity is okay for sunglasses for this price range. I have Zeal Optics's sunglasses and their lens look far better in terms of focus and clarity though I like baby beach design better. I'd love to have Zeal Optics lens in Baby Beach frame.
customer_reviews.author: Life is good

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller faces!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance after reading the reviews on these sunglasses and bought them. I need polarized lenses and love the look of aviators but they always looked ridiculous on my face. These glasses fit my face perfectly! I can wear them comfortably with a hat or visor too. The lenses are crystal clear and the glare is greatly reduced compared to other glasses I’ve tried. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyers BEWARE 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.text: FAKE!!! I was sent fake Oakley sunglasses and I ordered Maui Jim Baby Beach!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses that fit under full face motorcycle helmet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of sunglasses that wouldn't dig into my temples while wearing my full face helmet. These are perfect. Comfortable and dark enough to provide protection from a setting sun. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Fire Chick

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are nice light weight sunglasses. Very comfortable. Good on most women. I am average size woman and older. Aviators were to large. These are good to fit with a riding helmet (horse not sure about others). Mine look like real M J not fakes. I ordered rose and blue lens both looked great. These are lighter lens and very clear. If you want very dark lenses you might choose a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Polarized Film is cloudy
customer_reviews.text: For a pair of $200+ sunglasses to last only 4 years I guess is a lot to ask. The polarized film is so cloudy you can't see out of the lenses. Mfg warranty is 2 years. You can add another two years for approx. $50. I didn't buy the additional 2 years so now I'm spending $80 to replace the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Fake glasses were sent very cheap case / microfiber cloth everything was completely wrong for a pair of Maui jims
customer_reviews.author: Frank G

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these for my wife. I scratched the old ones while trying to clean them. :/ They look great on her, well she looks great and makes the glasses look better ;) If I scratch them again, I'll get another pair for her. These are great sunglasses, look good, fit well, overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JM Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome sun glasses. They fit perfectly and did not require any adjustments. Lenses are super clear. My eyes are very sensitive and water easily if I use glasses with lenses that are not clear and that causes my eyes to re-focus. Customer service by Christine was impeccable and I won't hesitate recommending purchasing the lenses from EyeSave through Amazon. Thank you EyeSave
customer_reviews.author: Debra Booysen

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for a woman that has a smaller head/face
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for a woman that has a smaller head/face. My wife absolutely loves them. Very stylish. They do not look like they are "oversized" like some women's Aviators do. The lens is a gradient style that is slightly lighter on the bottom and darker on top...subtle, but very effective. UV and polarized reduce glare and strain. Worth the price if you are protective of your shades, which my wife is. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as expected
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING at all as advertised! I received a completely different pair of glasses. Different maker, different style, size was nothing as said. Tried to return them but was denied. I am now stuck with a pair of sunglasses I can't even give away. I would like to give them no stars but that's not allowed. So 1 star it is🙁
customer_reviews.author: beth kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Rose you!
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim sunglasses are pretty expensive but this is my 3rd pair and worth the money. I like the rose lenses which really cut glare. These frames are for a more narrow face ...female. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: So cheap/plastic, not usual Maui Jim, wondered if knock-off
customer_reviews.text: Sad to see such quality from a favorite maker...when I first open these I thought surely they were not real Maui Jim's because they feel so flimsy and plastic. Although I carefully keep them in their cloth bag and case because they're so expensive, they quickly started showing scratches across lenses. Horrible, cheap-seeming quality. Thinking I need to contact Maui Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Marcinkowski

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Dad's Aviators
customer_reviews.text: I love the Maui Jim quality and style of all the glasses, but finding a good fit for me has been somewhat problematic. I love the substantial glasses like the Maui Jim Punchbowl and Kuiaha Bay, but the larger frames obstruct my periferial vision. In addition, most aviator style glasses make me look like I'm auditioning for a role in CHIPs, but these don't. The aviator style is subtle, yet stylish. Great job Maui Jim!(The shipping was fast, the glasses were well packaged, and all the components were included: the case, cloth pouch, and manual.)
customer_reviews.author: TheGWord

customer_reviews.title: Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Description said glass lenses but they were not glass they were plastic, the glasses were extremely small. Did not look like quality glasses I have seen from Maui Jim, I will return and purchase from a store in person
customer_reviews.author: brent mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife, and she couldn't be happier. They're her go to sunglasses. Perfect fit, and style. Best anti glare lens out there
customer_reviews.author: Alternatetune

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for small faces
customer_reviews.text: I bought these July 2018 and I love them! I tried several pairs of sunglasses at a mall store before purchasing, including these. I always have a hard time finding a good fit for my small/narrow face. These are comfortable and surprisingly durable for the thin frame. Works great for everyday wear and beach/pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Lens polarization was not "right"
customer_reviews.text: The pair I received was really cheap and the hinges seemed defective.
customer_reviews.author: Aren Clark

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these and I love them. They are strong enough to keep the sun out but people can see you eyes so you aren't hiding. This important because I deal with customers in sunny places and want them to see my eyes but need protection. I also like that they are not too big on my face like almost every other aviators I have tried. I highly recommend these shades!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula the Glass Artist

customer_reviews.title: She Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: present for my special someone. I think it's her 4th pair of Maui Jim's. I had shopped for a few months up until Christmas and am in no way disappointed in buying them here. They came with the right case and all the accoutrements MJ wants you to have. (I have bought at stores before and they give you an incorrect bulky case or don't include the shammy and documentation) Knowing what I know now, I would do it this way again. You can really tell this bring a lot of sunshine into her day.
customer_reviews.author: Soon Parted

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses for women who don't like the aviator with the drop bottom. they enhances your eyes instead of pulling your faced down and enhancing your cheeks
customer_reviews.author: janene

customer_reviews.title: Hardware quality seems suspect
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight frame and dark graded lenses make these perfect for active wear in bright conditions. However, 6 months in with careful wearing in a light rotation with several other pairs of sunglasses and the screws connecting the temple to the frame on one side popped out already. Obviously an easy fix but why would that happen so quickly. Never owned this brand before but quality seems suspect to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sunglasses. Comfortable smaller frames than one normally finds ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sunglasses. Comfortable smaller frames than one normally finds in the glasses styles I like. The lenses were happily dark enough. The frames are very nice and unique. Not like everyone else's glasses. Feel good. Nice and classy. The frames aren't THAT small so women shouldn't be deterred by that. Only downside is that I lose sunglasses so will have to be careful with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best sunglasses I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best sunglasses I have ever owned. They are built great and come with a cleaning cloth and hard case. The lifetime search for sunglasses for a narrow face is over. They're expensive but I hope to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses have that classic never out of style look. This is my second pair of these and love them. Shipping was so fast I was shocked they were at my house so soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, I love these glasses, they are great if you have a smaller head, fit is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: JHS

customer_reviews.title: these glasses are great. I love them
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small face, or a petite frame, these glasses are great. I love them. They're light, and the vision is clear and exactly what I look for in sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small faces!!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for a long time for a pair of aviators that fit my narrow face. These are absolutely perfect! Two other people have since purchased them too because they loved them too. Also they came in 1 week when they estimated 3 weeks for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lang

customer_reviews.title: I have found my shades!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Baby Beaches and my 5th pair of Mauis. I love how light these glasses are and they are perfect for my small face. I have since bought a pair in every color available in this style. I get compliments on them all of the time! I am very rough with my shades but these seem hardy and I love the warranty Maui Jim has. The polarized lenses are great for the beach, driving my jeep, fishing, and just wearing in most skies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+ ... but no cloth sleeve?
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit. Only criticism is I wish they included a cloth sleeve. The case they included is not always practical.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Best ever especially for smaller faces
customer_reviews.text: Only sunglasses I will ever have. Loved these so much that within minutes of my dropping mine in the ocean(ugh!) I was on my phone ordering another pair
customer_reviews.author: megan m.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small faces!
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficult time finding glasses that for my small narrow face. Especially quality adult glasses. These glasses are perfect. They fit and look great. I would definitely purchase another pair & probably will to get the darker gray lens for full full sun. Although the brown lenses i got still work very well in full sun.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: UVA protection is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sun protection. Stylish and perfect for a small face.
customer_reviews.author: carol adams

customer_reviews.title: Love them! And they are poloarizd
customer_reviews.text: I've had several pairs of Maui Jim's... Particulary the Baby Beaches.... Love them! And they are poloarizd!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: They’re great. They fit my small face. There very light and sturdy. Really confirtable on my eyes
customer_reviews.author: K. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I too, a lot of heat for spending this much on sunglasses, but... C'mon. Aviators for a small face? Yes please. I didn't want to be a Paris Hilton wannabe with giant sunglasses that take over my face. These are perfect. I finally don't look like I'm trying on grown up sunglasses. Great to have something stylish that fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: I NEVER HEARD IF THEY LIKED IT OR
customer_reviews.text: I WISH I COULD WRITE A REVIEW. THIS WAS A GIFT, BUT, I NEVER HEARD IF THEY LIKED IT OR NOT
customer_reviews.author: Anna K. Salser

customer_reviews.title: Maui
customer_reviews.text: Love the sunglasses. They fit my face perfectly and I love the fact that I don’t have glare
customer_reviews.author: JillSalsa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small faces
customer_reviews.text: Finally a decent sized pair of aviators! (A little smaller even would work). I've always loved the style but has been impossible to find for small faces. Have another pair of Maui Jims and the quality is untouched! Only downsides: pricey (better here than in the stores though), and could be a little darker tint. Overall still very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Maui Jim sunglasses that look amazing on anyone
customer_reviews.text: These aviator sunglasses are polerized to protect your eyes and the titanium frame is delicate and sturdy. They look amazing on most people. I love aviators but do not like the large oversized ones that are on the market. Also, these come in silver, black or gold finish. I went with the silver and just love them
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great for any face
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit my face perfectly! I am 5'3"so have a smaller face and these are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylin'
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shades, polarized lenses. They fit smaller faces so well. Plus, they're lightweight. I love the Baby Beach style sunglasses better than most other styles I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kat_W

customer_reviews.title: Great for Narrow Faces
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have a narrow face and wanted aviator frames. They are very lightweight and look great. The lens are kind of dark for me, I do not think that they improve my vision all that much. I was hoping to be a little more impressed but overall I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen from MI

customer_reviews.title: and like these much better as far as fit
customer_reviews.text: I had Ray-ban aviators before these, and like these much better as far as fit...the case is a little annoying, not easy to just throw them in, kind of have to be neat about putting them back in
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Company! Excellent sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Maui Jim exceeded my expectations!!! Excellent sunglasses and an even better company! I bought these sunglasses in April 2015 and experienced an issue with them in early December 2016. I sent them in for repair and not only was I not charged for the repair, but I received a new case for my glasses. Maui Jim is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: HST

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: loved the look and the fit, however they arrived with a scratch in the lens so have to send them back, hoping to exchange
customer_reviews.author: renbur

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses so much!!! Best pair by far that I've ever owned. Love the smaller lense size. The polarized lenses are amazing. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my girlfriend's bday and she loves them. They look great, are super light, and obviously have fantastic lenses. She has a fairly small face, but they fit my average sized man's head as well.
customer_reviews.author: Unavailable

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses the best
customer_reviews.text: Love them the best I have another pair and these are a little smaller which gives me a different look and I like that so they feel good look good are comfortable light also if you have a small fade they fit well so overall there a 10
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Instead of sunglasses I was sent a flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I normally love these Maui Jim sunglasses and wanted a new pair. Unfortunately, I was sent a $5 flashlight instead of these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: ACK

customer_reviews.title: Best shades out there. Polarized glass is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement baby beach for the pair my wife left in a restaurant. Pisses me off that they got lost but they are worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: 789Ltr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit for small faces.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best aviator glasses. I love how they actually fit a small face. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect pair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these glasses. I have always worn Maui Jim but really wanted an aviator style, these are perfect. They fit my face and don’t look silly or huge. My go to pair now!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Loved these sunglasses. I have a small face so they fit perfectly. Seemed really well made. Loved the shape. Unfortunately I had to return them. Costco said they could put prescription lenses in them and then when I took them in they said no.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller faces- LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Most sunglasses are huge on my face, like bug eyes. These are PERFECT, which is very hard to find, especially in aviators. The polarized lenses are amazing- I don't want to take them off. They are lightweight and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Father of One

customer_reviews.title: Love bb
customer_reviews.text: Love the beach babies. I have owned 3 pairs! Very light on your face. I like the petite size for a smaller framed face
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love these - perfection I'm afraid of scratching them or breaking them but I love them
customer_reviews.author: RadVan

customer_reviews.title: Great frame for small faces
customer_reviews.text: I have a small face so I like that the lenses are not overwhelmingly large. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! I have been looking for aviators that did not cover half my face and these are perfect. I also love that they are polarized. Maui Jims are on the high end, but this is my second pair and and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and look great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and look great. I like that they stay in place without leaving marks on the bridge of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: My face is small and these fit amazingly! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the product having scratches, flaws or imperfections (as the description described it as having "scuffs"). It turned out to be impeccable and in great condition. Could not be happier with the quality and service! I have these in the bronze sense with RX and wanted the regular sense for when I wear contacts. Unbelievable - once you have Maui lenses, everything else seems like poor quality. If I could wear their lenses all day, every day, I would
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: lightweight great sport glasses
customer_reviews.text: love the lightness of these glasses. Also impressed with the polarized lenses and the protection of the light. I also like the fact that it does not leave the indentation on your nose bridge as some glasses do.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Fit, style, comfort, it's all there. Worth every penny. My eyes are very sun-sensitive and these are the best I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Knew what I was looking for and these came quickly and perfect fit. God forbid something happens to them
customer_reviews.text: Did a bit of research before ordering sunglasses online. Knew what I was looking for and these came quickly and perfect fit. God forbid something happens to them, will re-order exactly the same!
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: These shades are PERFECT for people with small faces like me
customer_reviews.text: These shades are PERFECT for people with small faces like me. I always have a difficult time finding the right size of sunglasses for my small face and these glasses fit fantastic. They're beautiful by the way!
customer_reviews.author: Ziziz

customer_reviews.title: AS EXPECTED.
customer_reviews.text: I got these sunglasses per a recomendation from friends. At first glance, a little pricey compaired to what I usually sepnd on sunglasses. Owning a pair, they are worth every penny. Clear, lightweight and fit perfectly right our of the box. I am Maui Jim fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davalos

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are awesome for a small face!
customer_reviews.text: I always have trouble finding sunglasses that fit. These fit really well, and really do the job. Now I need to find wrap arounds that fit a small face!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Casinghino

customer_reviews.title: I have a small face and these sunglasses fit perfect! They don't overwhelm smaller features
customer_reviews.text: I have a small face and these sunglasses fit perfect! They don't overwhelm smaller features. The quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kid's Sunglasses, But Expen$ive...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best optical quality sunglasses for a small face. But you really need to teach your kids responsibility if you're going to give them to a kid...
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Maui Jim sunglasses. The polarized lenses are THE BEST. I usually have a hard time finding sunglasses because I have a small face, but these are perfect. They are also very lightweight and the bottom of the lens doesn't touch my cheeks. I like my Ray Ban aviators, but they are heavy and the glass lenses are fragile. If you have a small face, love aviators, and want something lightweight and comfortable with a polarized lens, these are definitely a pair to try.
customer_reviews.author: Perrin Langlois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Baby Beach glasses. Tried them on at store first.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small face.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of Maui Jim. I’ve had a variety of styles. The Baby Beach are my 4th pair, and my favorite! Light weight, perfect for a petite woman, who normally wears child sized glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great aviator style sunglasses for small heads
customer_reviews.text: Usually can't rock aviators b/c too big but these fit snug, are light enough that I barely notice them, but feel sturdy. I would darken the lens a bit and I kind of prefer mirrored lenses on aviators, but all in all great glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking glasses for someone with a smaller head/face. excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glasses! Have a smaller head and this fit perfectly...Now if only I don't lose these again...3rd pair I've had to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus_Evora 400

customer_reviews.title: great price on a great item
customer_reviews.text: great price on a great item. for someone with a small head, the smaller sized frames are a must, and these fit as hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Billy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! I did try this model at the mall in Sunglasses hut to compare with Ray Ban Aviator model. I have small facial features & this model fits great. BUT I now have to find optical store that will have equipment to make prescription lens (Sam's Club can't)!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Loubert

customer_reviews.title: The glasses are great
customer_reviews.text: I would say love this product (5 stars), however, the case just recently "broke." It still holds the sunglasses, but whatever device kept it closed and tight, broke. Sunglasses are great though!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunglasses for men and women who have a head ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sunglasses for men and women who have a head size, which would cause them to wear a 'Small'-size hat...
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: These are the best sunglasses I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sunglasses I have ever owned. Very light weight with nice lenses. I will say I have a small face and these may look too small on a larger or round face.
customer_reviews.author: lisa engels

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome lens.. the 9 layered, blocks glare with zero impact to vision.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sunglasses! I have a petite frame and most sunglasses overpower my face. Not these. Perfect fit for me. If you are looking for good quality sunglasses to fit your smaller face, these are the ones to get.
customer_reviews.author: Rene K.

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses on the market
customer_reviews.text: Lots of imitators, but these are the real deal. Maui Jim makes the best sun glasses out there. They aren't cheap, but they are quality.
customer_reviews.author: PjcostaBgrt

customer_reviews.title: ... my tiny nose when riding horses and they look good for my small
customer_reviews.text: Wear these everyday and they don't slip down my tiny nose when riding horses and they look good for my small features
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Item ~ Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Maui Jim's, so obviously I love these glasses! This pair was no exception. The seller shipped them very quickly and they were brand new in the box just as they said they would be! I was also very pleased with the price. I am extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are so small, they look more like a wayfairer than a trooper. Returned
customer_reviews.author: jamie1972

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are well made and fit perfectly, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! These are the most comfortable sunglasses I have ever worn!! It's hard for me to find sunglasses that fit good on my small face, and these look very nice on!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I like it but too small
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are of good quality and light weight but way too small for my face. I have small oval shap face but they are still too small. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Madoka

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit for a small face-also nice and light weight. Great overall coverage due to size of lens, much better than skinny lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Glasses fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Glasses fit perfect! The frame is super light. The lenses are a little darker than expected but still work great. The only issue was that the Maui Jim sunglass case came without the cleaning cloth and other cloths don't work as well to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Maui Jim Baby Beach Aviator Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Baby Beach, located on the North Shore of Maui, is a perfect beach for keiki and adults alike to enjoy a day filled with sun and fun. Like their namesake, these frames from Maui Jim are offered in a fun series of bright colors nestled in a strong but lightweight frame that's perfect for any sort of activity.
feature_bullets: Click the Maui Jim link above to visit our brand store, where you can find our entire catalog of sunglasses
All Maui Jim sunglasses feature PolarizedPlus2 lens technology that go beyond shielding your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays by enhancing colors to reveal the true beauty of the world around you
Enjoy ultimate UV protection combined with premium style, incredible durability, glare-free vision, and color-boosting patented technologies
HCL Bronze lenses feature a warm tint that provides versatility in changing light conditions
Lenses made with MauiPure material for crisp optics and excellent shatter & scratch resistance
Titanium frame is lightweight, durable and comfortable
